programme.title: Ora Juaj
programme.desc: Cdo dite gazetari Patrik Sadikaj me shtypin e dites dhe telefonatat live komunikon me cdo qytetar per problemet qe ata kane. Zeri I qytetareve ne kete format vjen nepermjet rasteve bisedave Live.(n)

programme.title: Show Bizz
programme.desc: Nje format me lajmet per boten muzikore nderkombetare shfaqet ne Ora News nga e e hene e premte ora 15.30 me qellim vetem informimin.(n)

programme.title: Missing: 72 ore da incubo
programme.desc: Le storie di persone scomparse e delle difficili indagini, nel disperato tentativo di ritrovarle. A Darlington, la polizia e' preoccupata per la sicurezza del 12enne Joshua. Prox Ep. 8 set 06:50 CI. Rep. 8 set 06:00 CI.(n)

programme.title: Profondo nero di Carlo Lucarelli
programme.desc: In compagnia di Carlo Lucarelli, addentriamoci nei meandri piu' oscuri della mente criminale, scovando i segreti di queste persone. Tra il 1968 e il 1985 il cosiddetto Mostro di Firenze compie otto duplici omicidi. Per la prima volta in Italia si parla di 'serial killer'. Prox Ep. 8 set 05:00 CI. Rep. 16 set 06:00 CI.(n)

programme.title: Gli angeli della morte
programme.desc: Charles Edmund Cullen affermava di non poter sopportare che le persone soffrissero. L'uomo diventa uno dei piu' prolifici serial killer del New Jersey, uccidendo piu' di 40 pazienti. Prox Ep. 8 set 08:30 CI.(n)

programme.title: Poligamia: in fuga dalla famiglia
programme.desc: Jessica e Shanell incontrano Ava, una ragazza che vuole disperatamente abbandonare il suo 'clan' ed evitare il matrimonio con un suo cugino piu' anziano. La giovane ha meno di 18 anni. Prox Ep. 8 set 09:20 CI.(n)

programme.title: Accused: colpevole o innocente?
programme.desc: Dopo essersi presa cura del figlio malato, una madre nasconde un terribile segreto. Accusata di aver tentato di ucciderlo, la donna deve lottare per la sua liberta'. Prox Ep. 8 set 10:10 CI.(n)

programme.title: Chi e' l'assassino?
programme.desc: Il corpo senza vita del 27enne Carmelo Castronovo viene ritrovato l'8 dicembre del 2013 in una piccola cittadina della Francia. Chi lo ha ucciso e per quale motivo? Prox Ep. 8 set 11:00 CI.(n)

programme.title: Negli occhi del detective
programme.desc: Nel deserto, viene ritrovato un teschio. Accanto c'e' un braccialetto di diamanti con il nome di Ron. I detective Phil e Jimmy tentano di capire cosa e' accaduto. Prox Ep. 8 set 11:55 CI. Rep. 26 set 10:10 CI.(n)

programme.title: Tupac: il caso e' aperto
programme.desc: Benjamin Crump e la sua squadra analizzano una lettera autentica, trovata di recente. Le indagini portano alla luce nuove prove e il caso sembra essere sempre piu' difficile da risolvere.(n)

programme.title: Mostri senza nome - Roma
programme.desc: Filippo Nigro analizza i piu' intricati cold case romani, che tra gli anni '90 e 2000 hanno riempito le prime pagine dei giornali. Analizziamo il caso di Libero Ricci. Prox Ep. 11 set 01:40 CI. Rep. 10 set 01:40 CI.(n)

programme.title: Scomparsi
programme.desc: Pietro Orlandi riapre i piu' oscuri casi di persone svanite nel nulla, che sono ancora insoluti, tra cui quello di Mirella Gregori, 15enne scomparsa nel 1983. Prox Ep. 18 set 19:15 CI. Rep. 17 set 19:15 CI.(n)

programme.title: Fratelli di sangue
programme.desc: Dopo il verdetto, Erik e suo fratello vengono mandati in prigioni diverse. Erik e i suoi avvocati iniziano a prepararsi per l'appello. Il sipario e' davvero calato su un caso cosi' eclatante?(n)

programme.title: Matrimoni da incubo
programme.desc: Una misteriosa scomparsa porta gli investigatori nel mondo segreto dello spionaggio, Ma solo dieci anni dopo la verita' viene a galla, mostrando chi e' il killer. Prox Ep. 8 set 17:25 CI.(n)

programme.title: Delitti: famiglie criminali
programme.desc: 14 novembre 2017. Andrea La Rosa, 35 anni, ex calciatore, scompare dopo aver incontrato un amico. Un mese dopo il corpo viene ritrovato nel bagagliaio di un'auto. Prox Ep. 8 set 18:20 CI. Rep. 27 set 0:45 CI.(n)

programme.title: Scomparsi
programme.desc: 17 giugno 2009: Nicholas Ravaioli ha la febbre alta. La madre esce di casa per comprare le medicine, ma al suo rientro il figlio e' scomparso. Pietro Orlandi incontra va a Forli' per indagare sul caso. Prox ed ultimo Ep. 8 set 19:15 CI.(n)

programme.title: Impronta criminale
programme.desc: Nel New Jersey, la polizia indaga sulla morte di quattro persone. I cadaveri sono stati smembrati e gettati nella spazzatura. Chi ha commesso questi orribili crimini? Prox Ep. 8 set 20:10 CI. Rep. 11 set 11:55 CI.(n)

programme.title: Yara
programme.desc: Un caso unico. Un'investigazione senza precedenti. Una morte che ha toccato il cuore di tutti. Ripercorriamo un caso che ha sconvolto l'Italia: l'omicidio di Yara Gambirasio. Rep. 8 set 13:45 CI.(n)

programme.title: La baia del silenzio - 1^TV
programme.desc: Il reporter Ethan Brown trascorre molto tempo a Jennings e realizza che le uccisioni non sono opera di un solo killer. Ethan esamina il materiale raccolto dagli investigatori. Prox Ep. 14 set 22:00 CI. Rep. 8 set 14:40 CI.(n)

programme.title: Il killer-clown
programme.desc: Soprannominato il killer-clown per il suo lavoro come pagliaccio, John Wayne Gacy ha ucciso 33 persone, diventando uno dei peggiori serial killer di sempre. Prox Ep. 14 set 22:55 CI. Rep. 14 set 16:30 CI.(n)

programme.title: Ho ucciso le mie donne
programme.desc: Tammy Lee, agente che si e' occupato della raccolta delle testimonianze relative al caso di Chris Watts, rivela nuovi dettagli su una vicenda che ha sconvolto l'America. Rep. 8 set 15:35 CI.(n)

programme.title: Chi ha ucciso i nostri bambini?
programme.desc: Detroit 1976: 4 ragazzi, tra i 10 e i 12 anni, vengono uccisi. Un detective affronta un viaggio oscuro in cui si intrecciano storie di disperazione e abusi. Prox Ep. 15 set 0:45 CI. Rep. 27 set 11:55 CI.(n)

programme.title: Il mostro di Modena
programme.desc: Modena, anni '80: appena fuori citta', nelle campagne, iniziano a comparire i corpi straziati di giovani ragazze. Sui giornali si comincia a parlare del 'mostro di Modena'. Prox ed ultimo Ep. 9 set 01:40 CI. Rep. 12 set 15:35 CI.(n)

programme.title: Gli angeli della morte
programme.desc: Kimberly Clark Saenz, 34 anni, sembrava una bravissima infermiera. Ma nel centro dialisi in Texas nessuno conosceva veramente la donna e poteva immaginare cosa era in grado di fare. Prox Ep. 9 set 02:35 CI. Rep. 10 set 08:30 CI.(n)

programme.title: 24 ore per morire
programme.desc: Bruino, 18 febbraio ore 12.30. Giacomo Bellorio riceve da una vicina di banco un portafogli. Dentro c'e' una lettera firmata in cui la donna scrive di voler abbandonare la famiglia. Su questo programma sono disponibili i sottotitoli per non udenti. Per attivarli, premi il tasto 'i'.(n)

programme.title: Missing: 72 ore da incubo
programme.desc: Dopo essere andato al lavoro, il 49enne George Richardson scompare nel nulla. La famiglia pensa che la polizia potrebbe fare molto di piu' per scoprire la verita' su quanto e' accaduto. Prox Ep. 9 set 04:45 CI. Rep. 11 set 06:50 CI.(n)

programme.title: Profondo nero di Carlo Lucarelli
programme.desc: In compagnia di Carlo Lucarelli, addentriamoci nei meandri piu' oscuri della mente criminale, scovando i segreti di queste persone. 11 aprile 1953, il cadavere di Wilma Montesi viene trovato sulla spiaggia di Torvaianica. La morte diventera' un vero e proprio caso mediatico. Prox Ep. 9 set 07:40 CI. Rep. 8 set 07:40 CI.(n)

programme.title: Missing: 72 ore da incubo
programme.desc: Le storie di persone scomparse e delle difficili indagini, nel disperato tentativo di ritrovarle. A Darlington, la polizia e' preoccupata per la sicurezza del 12enne Joshua. Prox Ep. 8 set 06:50 CI. Rep. 18 set 04:45 CI.(n)

programme.title: Missing: 72 ore da incubo
programme.desc: Le storie di persone scomparse e delle difficili indagini, nel disperato tentativo di ritrovarle. Poco dopo il suo matrimonio, Darren svanisce nel nulla. I detective iniziano a indagare. Prox Ep. 9 set 06:50 CI. Rep. 9 set 06:00 CI.(n)

programme.title: Profondo nero di Carlo Lucarelli
programme.desc: In compagnia di Carlo Lucarelli, addentriamoci nei meandri piu' oscuri della mente criminale, scovando i segreti di queste persone. 11 aprile 1953, il cadavere di Wilma Montesi viene trovato sulla spiaggia di Torvaianica. La morte diventera' un vero e proprio caso mediatico. Prox Ep. 9 set 07:40 CI. Rep. 17 set 06:00 CI.(n)

programme.title: Gli angeli della morte
programme.desc: Beverley Allitt era un'infermiera amorevole. Fece da madrina per il primo figlio di una coppia che era stata in ospedale. Ma non esito' a rendere disabile il loro secondo figlio. Prox Ep. 9 set 08:30 CI. Rep. 14 set 04:45 CI.(n)

programme.title: Poligamia: in fuga dalla famiglia
programme.desc: Andrea e Amanda ricevono delle notizie su Lorin, un uomo che vuole fuggire da una setta. Lorin non e' d'accordo con le regole ferree del culto e ha deciso di abbandonarlo. Prox Ep. 9 set 09:20 CI.(n)

programme.title: Accused: colpevole o innocente?
programme.desc: Un giovane uomo assiste a una brutale aggressione e interviene sferrando un pugno. Era giustificato a farlo o dovra' scontare una pena di 20 anni? Prox Ep. 9 set 10:10 CI.(n)

programme.title: Chi e' l'assassino?
programme.desc: 1 aprile 2013: Mickael chiama la polizia, affermando che la sua fidanzata Edwige e' stata uccisa. Sulla scena del crimine, c'e' qualcosa che non convince i poliziotti. Prox Ep. 9 set 11:00 CI.(n)

programme.title: Negli occhi del detective
programme.desc: Febbraio 2001: alcuni bambini scoprono macabri resti umani. La polizia inizia le indagini sperando di identificare le vittime e di catturare il killer prima possibile. Prox ed ultimo Ep. 9 set 11:55 CI. Rep. 26 set 11:00 CI.(n)

programme.title: I miei 60 giorni all'inferno - Narcoland
programme.desc: Sei coraggiosi partecipanti si infiltrano nel carcere di Pinal County, struttura afflitta dalle sanguinose dinamiche del mondo del narcotraffico. Prox Ep. 9 set 12:50 CI. Rep. 30 set 21:05 CI.(n)

programme.title: Yara
programme.desc: Un caso unico. Un'investigazione senza precedenti. Una morte che ha toccato il cuore di tutti. Ripercorriamo un caso che ha sconvolto l'Italia: l'omicidio di Yara Gambirasio. Rep. 29 set 01:40 CI.(n)

programme.title: La baia del silenzio

programme.desc: Una bambina di 8 anni si allontana per giocare, ma dopo un po' svanisce nel nulla. Inizia una ricerca disperata: gli investigatori sperano nell'aiuto delle telecamere. Prox Ep. 16 set 22:55 CI.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth - Incubo sulla collina
programme.desc: con A.Boden, S.Ulrich; USA 2017 (110 min). Elizabeth Smart viene rapita da un 'predicatore' all'eta' di 14 anni. Quel giorno per lei inizia un incubo che si concludera' dopo nove mesi, trascorsi in prigionia su una collina, con la sua liberazione.(n)

programme.title: Il caso Epstein: scandalo a corte
programme.desc: Alcune interviste rivelano i rapporti tra il principe Andrew e l'imprenditore Jeffrey Epstein. Secondo le testimonianze, il duca di York sarebbe coinvolto in diversi abusi sessuali. Rep. 21 set 14:40 CI.(n)

programme.title: Le prime 48 ore
programme.desc: Un giovane viene ucciso a colpi d'arma da fuoco in un complesso di appartamenti. La struttura, pero', era sotto indagine federale a causa di un video rap. Prox ed ultimo Ep. 19 set 0:45 CI.(n)

programme.title: Mostri senza nome - Roma
programme.desc: Filippo Nigro indaga sull'omicidio di Antonella Di Veroli, uccisa nell'aprile del 1994. Si apre il caso, le piste si riducono e si ipotizza il delitto passionale. Prox ed ultimo Ep. 12 set 20:10 CI. Rep. 12 set 19:15 CI.(n)

programme.title: Gli angeli della morte
programme.desc: Victorino Chua riesce a falsificare il suo curriculum e viene assunto in un ospedale di Manchester. Ma l'uomo sente di dover soddisfare 'il diavolo che e' in lui' e da quel momento nessuno dei pazienti all'interno della struttura sara' al sicuro. Prox ed ultimo Ep. 15 set 02:35 CI. Rep. 16 set 08:30 CI.(n)

programme.title: Profondo nero di Carlo Lucarelli
programme.desc: In compagnia di Carlo Lucarelli, addentriamoci nei meandri piu' oscuri della mente criminale, scovando i segreti di queste persone. Tra l'ottobre 1977 e l'agosto 2000 Salvatore Avantaggiato commette due omicidi. Viene arrestato ma durante uno dei permessi uccide di nuovo... Prox Ep. 15 set 03:40 CI. Rep. 20 set 08:30 CI.(n)

programme.title: 24 ore per morire
programme.desc: In criminologia, le 24 ore prima del delitto sono fondamentali per chiarire lo scenario di un crimine. Ceglie del Campo: Chiara Brandonisio sta andando a lavoro. Ad attenderla, c'e' il suo carnefice. Su questo programma sono disponibili i sottotitoli per non udenti. Per attivarli, premi il tasto 'i'.(n)

programme.title: Rapite - Sopravvissute all'inferno
programme.desc: Sei giovani donne parlano della terribile esperienza del rapimento, raccontando storie di orrori e rinascite. Ad aiutarle, ci sara' Elizabeth Smart, anch'essa vittima di rapimento.(n)

programme.title: Profiling
programme.desc: Una donna viene ritrovata annegata nella sua vasca da bagno. Chloe scopre un precedente sconcertante: la vittima e suo marito erano sopravvissuti allo tsunami del 2004. Prox Ep. 8 set 06:55. Rep. 8 set 04:50.(n)

programme.title: The Murders
programme.desc: Rita e' tenuta ostaggio da un ex detenuto che lei stessa aveva fatto condannare. Il sequestratore lancia una sfida a Kate, che e' costretta ad affrontarlo disarmata... Prox ed ultimo Ep. 7 set 09:40. Rep. 8 set 02:15.(n)

programme.title: The Murders
programme.desc: Nel finale di stagione, la caccia che Nolan e Kate stanno dando a un serial killer si trasforma in una sorta di gioco del gatto col topo, in cui Kate rischia di avere la peggio... Rep. 8 set 03:05.(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Mentre Blake riceve l'inaspettata - e preoccupante - visita di suo marito, la squadra e' chiamata in Michigan per trovare il folle che sta rapendo e uccidendo delle coppie. Prox Ep. 7 set 11:25.(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Mentre e' a New York con il figlio per vedere Beth, Hotch e' contattato da suo fratello Sean, che non sente da anni. Sean chiede ad Aaron di aiutarlo in un caso di omicidio. Prox ed ultimo Ep. 7 set 17:35.(n)

programme.title: La signora in giallo
programme.desc: Durante il ricevimento per la presentazione di un videogame il cui copione e' stato scritto da Jessica, avviene un omicidio. Prox Ep. 7 set 13:10. Rep. 12 set 09:20.(n)

programme.title: La signora in giallo
programme.desc: Jessica sta scrivendo il suo libro da Wally Hampton, proprietario di una scuderia. Matt Cleveland, allenatore di cavalli, viene ucciso. Prox Ep. 8 set 12:15. Rep. 12 set 10:10.(n)

programme.title: NCIS Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sam sceglie di lavorare da solo, abbandonando il team, per cercare di fermare Tahir Khaled, ed impedirgli per sempre di infastidire la sua famiglia.(n)

programme.title: NCIS Los Angeles
programme.desc: Nona stagione per le indagini della sezione segreta dell'NCIS. Mentre Hetty, andata in pensione, e' sparita, il nuovo Assistente del Direttore arriva in citta'. Intanto un attacco nord coreano incombe... Prox Ep. 7 set 19:15.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: A Bullet Runs Through It - Part One Part one of two. Brass and Sofia are involved in a shoot-out that leaves four people dead - including one cop. Crime drama, starring Paul Guilfoyle, Louise Lombard and William Peterson.(n)

programme.title: Elementary
programme.desc: Ancient History Sherlock and Joan believe New York City's Mafia may be behind a murder when they stumble across the body of a former assassin. While tracing the victim's ties to the underworld, Watson decides to take some time off to meddle in a friend's love life and investigates the mystery man she has recently fallen for. Modern-day Sherlock Holmes adventure, starring Jonny Lee Miller and Lucy Liu.(n)

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Season 1 Episode 1/10.(n)
programme.episode-num: Life in the Devon fishing port of Brixham. Spring is in the air, and the town is a hive of activity as skippers return their pleasure yachts to the water after winter in the dry dock, while the pressure is on for Brixham to look its best for the arrival of Princess Anne, who will officially open the new £20million fish market, and the start of the summer season <div class="other"> (Subtitles) (Repeat)

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming visits Glasgow, one of his favourite cities, to reveal unusual and often hidden sights and sounds overlooked by the public. Starting at the Necropolis, he travels to the world's oldest music hall before enjoying the views from a city-centre landmark. He also finds the time to take tea with a film star.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Friendship, Love, and Loyalty A woman voices outrage over her son's unsolved murder and Danny re-examines the case. Eddie is shot while on duty, Erin and her ex-husband face off in court and Frank deals with an angry police force after the mayor fails to defend it.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Risk Management Danny and Baez race to find a missing girl who will die within 72 hours without her heart medication. Starring Donnie Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: A Bullet Runs Through It - Part Two Part two of two. The father of the hospitalised witness threatens legal action against the police, and Grissom plans a reconstruction to determine where the fatal bullet came from.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.desc: Gone, Gone, Gone As the vampire-on-human attacks increase, the Authority struggles to maintain control, and the councillors make a desperate attempt to improve public morale. programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: Comings and Goings Hank is confronted by several of his old lovers at an awkward lunch which culminates when a drunken Stacy challenges him to a duel. programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The cameras follow three teams of fishermen participating in Brixham's annual Trawler Race, including a father and son who have been pitted against each other. The programme also meets Matt Kimble, a graduate who gave up on his plan to become a PE teacher and decided to follow his ancestors into the fishing trade instead.(n)

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham relives its glory days by hosting a vintage ships race and heritage festival, and a local toy-shop owner faces a difficult decision.(n)

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham hosts its annual Pirate Festival, paying tribute to Devon's colourful maritime history, while fisherman Nathan sets off in search of a lucrative catch.(n)

programme.title: Storm City
programme.desc: Avalanche Documentary in which Ben Fogle explores the devastating impact of extreme weather, finding out what happens when man is pitted against the power of Mother Nature. He begins with the chaos caused by snow and ice, using real-life studies - such as Montreal being shut down by a fierce ice storm in 1998 - and sharing incredible stories of survival. He then subjects a specially built test house to an avalanche, one of the world's deadliest natural forces.(n)

Meanwhile, Sherlock makes it clear that he is not impressed with the budding romance between Joan and Mycroft. Guest starring Rhys Ifans, with Jonny Lee Miller and Lucy Liu.(n)

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Teenager Logan starts work as an apprentice deck-hand, while landlady Pat recalls fond memories from her life in Brixham.(n)

programme.title: Storm City
programme.desc: Wind Ben Fogle presents the documentary exploring the devastating impact of extreme weather, finding out how destructive high-speed winds can be through a series of spectacular reconstructions.(n)

programme.title: Elementary
programme.desc: Blood Is Thicker Mycroft asks his brother to return with him to London as his stint in New York comes to an end. While pondering the offer, Sherlock looks into the murder of a beautiful young woman with a curious link to a billionaire CEO, but as new evidence moves the investigation in a surprising direction, he and Watson become entangled in a messy marital dispute. Johnny Lee Miller, Lucy Liu and Rhys Ifans star.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods (?)
programme.desc: My Aim Is True Danny and Baez investigate a string of drive-by shootings, which they believe are tied to the recent release of six wrongly convicted prisoners.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods (?)
programme.desc: Pilot Season 1 Episode 1/22.(n)
programme.episode-num: Pilot episode of the drama centred centred on New York City police commissioner Frank Reagan and his family, all of whom have ties to the city's legal system. Youngest son Jamie has just begun his career in the police force, but his life takes an unexpected turn when he is approached to help with a clandestine investigation that could seriously affect his family's legacy. Starring Tom Selleck, Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes and Len Cariou <div class="other"> (Subtitles) (Repeat)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (?)
programme.desc: Killer A criminal is involved in a car crash while fleeing Las Vegas after committing a murder. However, when the other driver tries to report the collision, he strangles her to death and drives away. Catherine and Warrick begin to investigate the two crimes - unaware they are connected. Meanwhile, Brass becomes suspicious of a thug with a rape conviction.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (?)
programme.desc: Pirates of the Third Reich A girl is found murdered with a number branded on her arm, and Grissom is distressed to learn that her mother is an old friend. A convicted sex offender who has been lobotomised leads the team to a Nazi sympathiser carrying out his own bizarre medical experiments. Melinda Clarke guest stars.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (?)
programme.desc: Up in Smoke The discovery of a body in a chimney leads Catherine and Warrick to reopen inquiries into the disappearance of a teenage girl. Using their access to the house to search for clues, they find a small bloodstain that matches her DNA - and the case turns into a double murder investigation. Starring Marg Helgenberger and Gary Dourdan.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods (?)
programme.desc: Samaritan The Reagans are forced to question their attitude toward vigilantism and the media after a man with a criminal record uses an illegal handgun to stop a robbery on the subway - then hands himself in to a local news reporter. Meanwhile, Jamie delves deeper into Danny's connection to the Blue Templar. Police drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods (?)
programme.desc: Privilege Two girls are attacked and a third is raped on a local college campus, and when Danny investigates, evidence suggests the culprit is a member of an elite fraternity, and the son of an Argentinian diplomat. Meanwhile, Sydney realises that Jamie is more dedicated to the police force than to her, and Frank is forced to question the appropriateness of his relationship with Kelly. Crime drama, starring Donnie Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: Generation Kill (?)
programme.desc: Get Some Drama following the movements of the 1st Reconnaissance Battalion, which led the American invasion of Iraq in 2003. The soldiers learn they will be accompanied by a columnist from Rolling Stone magazine. War drama, written by the team behind The Wire, Ed Burns and David Simon, and starring Jon Huertas and Eric Ladin.(n)

programme.title: Generation Kill (?)
programme.desc: The Cradle of Civilisation The soldiers of Bravo Company are ordered to treat any Iraqi holding a weapon as hostile as they head north, where Alpha company is fighting for the control of a bridge. Ferrando and the squad lag behind other companies after taking a wrong turn, and the platoon becomes involved in a violent but successful skirmish. Drama, starring Alexander Skarsgard, James Ransone and Chance Kelly.(n)

programme.title: Lovecraft Country (?)
programme.desc: A History of Violence Leti, Tic and Montrose head to Boston to search for missing pages to a crucial text. Ruby nurses her disappointment over a squandered job opportunity. Drama horror series following Atticus Freeman as he embarks on a road trip around 1950s America to search for his father. Starring Jonathan Majors and Jurnee Smollett.(n)

programme.title: City on a Hill (?)
programme.desc: What They Saw in Southie High Decourcy finds out that he has a powerful enemy in town. Meanwhile, the team open an investigation into a missing person, and Jackie causes trouble at home.(n)

programme.title: I Hate Suzie (?)
programme.desc: Fear Privacy is an issue, as Suzie finds hers invaded once again, but this time with the added fear of endangering her family, as her address is printed for the public to see.(n)

programme.title: Oz (?)
programme.desc: Great Men Alvarez refuses to disclose the identity of the man who raped Glynn's daughter, Adebisi voices his contempt for higher education, and Said tries to get a retrial for Augustus Hill.(n)

programme.title: Californication (?)
programme.desc: Mia Culpa On the eve of Hank and Karen's move to New York, Mia returns with a new agent intent on exposing the writer's transgressions to save his client's fading career. Meanwhile, Charlie considers getting his vasectomy reversed. Starring David Duchovny, Natascha McElhone and Evan Handler.(n)

programme.title: Fish Town (?)
programme.desc: Season 1 Episode 9/10.(n)
programme.episode-num: Maritime Inn landlady Pat gets her first full house of the season as Brixham's tourist trade picks up for the summer - but refuses to hire anyone to help her with the extra work. Powerboat instructor Mike Weatherbee tries to enforce the laws of the sea, carpet-cleaner Dave Satchwill prepares to lead the town's popular ghost tour, and lone fisherman Dave Brown reveals his unusual methods <div class="other"> (Subtitles) (Repeat)

programme.title: Fish Town (?)
programme.desc: August arrives and the fishermen of Brixham spend time ashore with their families as their boats are repaired - but summer proves costly for Jan, who loses £1,000 for every day his vessel is out of action. Apprentice deckhand Logan has to decide whether a life at sea is the right choice for him and his family, and seafood seller Jenny receives a surprise on her 65th birthday.(n)

programme.title: The Guest Wing (?)
programme.desc: The Penningtons, owners of Muncaster Castle in the Lake District, discuss the challenges of housing three generations of their family under one roof, while elderly patriarch Patrick struggles to find new purpose following the death of his wife. At Maunsel House in Somerset, Sir Benjamin Slade's preconceptions are challenged when a gay men's choir arrives for a weekend break.(n)

programme.title: Fish Town (?)
programme.desc: Fish merchant Robert and his wife Kelly decide to open a seafood restaurant in Brixham - but their determinedly contemporary approach to cuisine leaves some locals unimpressed. The programme also follows the journey of a turbot over 36 hours, as it is caught and auctioned off before being served in an exclusive London restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Storm City (?)
programme.desc: Flood Four-part documentary in which Ben Fogle explores the devastating impact of extreme weather, finding out what happens when man is pitted against the power of Mother Nature. In this edition, he focuses on floods and the damage they can cause.(n)

programme.title: Elementary (?)
programme.desc: On the Line A cold case becomes a burning issue for Sherlock when he uncovers the identity of a serial killer long thought uncatchable. However, Captain Gregson and Detective Bell refuse to indulge his wild theories, prompting the sleuth and Watson to seek new allies in their pursuit of overdue justice. Guest starring Chris Bauer and Troy Garity, with Johnny Lee Miller and Lucy Liu.(n)

Crime drama, starring Donnie Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (?)
programme.desc: I Like to Watch TV cameras follow the CSIs for a reality crime series, putting everyone under pressure during a rape investigation. As the case progresses, the team uncovers evidence indicating a serial offender is on the loose. Guest starring Taraji P Henson.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (?)
programme.desc: The Unusual Suspect The team investigates the death of a schoolgirl whose body was found wrapped in a shower curtain. The evidence points to a classmate with a grudge, who admits his guilt - but the suspect's younger sister also confesses, throwing the case into disarray. Drama, starring Marg Helgenberger and Gary Dourdan.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (?)
programme.desc: Spellbound Grissom, Greg and Warrick investigate the death of a psychic who was shot in her occult shop. The ransacked store and empty till point to a robbery, but the money seems to have been taken by a delivery boy who has an alibi for the night in question. However, the post-mortem reveals a fatal plant extract in the body, forcing the team to the conclusion the death was premeditated murder - with several suspects.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods (?)
programme.desc: Officer Down Danny searches for Ricky Russo, the son of former crime boss Happy Jack, who is suspected of killing an off-duty policeman during a diamond robbery. However, Henry suspects the investigation is targeting the wrong man, and decides to see if Happy Jack can shed any more light on the case. Meanwhile, Erin is confounded by her teenage daughter's petulant behaviour. Crime drama, starring Tom Selleck, Donnie Wahlberg and Len Cariou, with Dominic Chianese.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods (?)
programme.desc: What You See The FBI alerts Frank to a potential bomb attack in Manhattan, and he puts the police on full alert in a bid to prevent disaster from striking the city. However, the force's attempts to locate the explosives leave several citizens feeling victimised, leading to accusations that officers are unfairly targeting certain sections of society. Drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: I Hate Suzie (?)
programme.desc: Shame Suzie gives a disastrous interview and struggles to make peace with her own desires. Meanwhile, Naomi is in hard-core damage control mode. Suzie Pickles, a star on the wane, has her whole life upended when she is hacked and a photo of her emerges in an extremely compromising position. Drama, starring Billie Piper.(n)

programme.title: The Sopranos (?)
programme.desc: Guy Walks into a Psychiatrist's Office With Uncle Junior in prison, Tony is now sole head of the professional 'waste disposal' business and FBI interest is mounting. Meanwhile, Christopher causes problems by selling phoney stock to senior citizens.(n)

programme.title: The Sopranos (?)
programme.desc: Do Not Resuscitate Junior is released from jail on medical grounds, and urges his nephew to make peace with Livia - whose nurse suggests she should be given a Do Not Resuscitate note. Janice tries to worm her way back into her family's affections, Pussy receives instructions from the FBI, and Tony intervenes in a construction dispute.(n)

Drama based in the turbulent political landscape of 1990s Italy. During the crucial debate between candidates Silvio Berlusconi and Achille Occhetto, Leonardo Notte struggles to defend his position in the party, while political opponents and his own conscience try to bring him down. Starring Stefano Accorsi. In Italian.(n)
Veronica is now a Member of Parliament, but her credibility is challenged by her co-workers. She finds support in her female colleagues when she decides to contribute to a cause.(n)

programme.title: Oz (?)
programme.desc: Losing Your Appeal Augustus Hill's appeal is turned down, O'Reily survives his operation, and Beecher is forced to meet the judge who sentenced him. Ernie Hudson stars.(n)

programme.title: Californication (?)
programme.desc: Exile on Main St Hank is released from prison and finds out it is public knowledge he is the author of a successful and controversial novel. However, there are still unresolved issues in his relationship with his daughter and Karen. Comedy drama, starring David Duchovny.(n)

programme.title: Urban Secrets (?)
programme.desc: Alan Cumming examines the hidden histories of cities, revealing the sights and sounds rarely witnessed by the public. He begins in London at St Paul's Cathedral, where he visits a place tourists never go, before exploring a hidden park and a little-known church. He also gets a guided tour of Soho from broadcaster Danny Baker.(n)

programme.title: Urban Secrets (?)
programme.desc: Alan Cumming tours the less-celebrated sights of Brighton, beginning by visiting the Toy and Model Museum to look at its collection of model trains. He then discovers a boutique that sells a variety of unusual items, before taking a glimpse behind the scenes at the Royal Pavilion.(n)

programme.title: The Guest Wing (?)
programme.desc: At Northumberland's Chillingham Castle, Sir Humphrey Wakefield prepares to hand over the estate to his apprehensive son Maximilian. Hard-working staff at Carlton Towers in North Yorkshire get ready for the arrival of 120 caravan owners for the annual rally and dinner dance.(n)

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The cameras follow three teams of fishermen participating in Brixham's annual Trawler Race, including a father and son who have been pitted against each other. Landlady Pat Seddon is not looking forward to the raucous celebrations, however, and decides to reminisce about past race days instead. The programme also meets Matt Kimble, a graduate who gave up on his plan to become a PE teacher and decided to follow his ancestors into the fishing trade instead.(n)

programme.title: Storm City
programme.desc: Earthquake Four-part documentary in which Ben Fogle explores the devastating impact of extreme weather, finding out what happens when man is pitted against the power of Mother Nature. In the final programme, he discovers how earthquakes wreak so much havoc.(n)

programme.title: Elementary
programme.desc: Tremors Sherlock makes an error of judgement during the arrest of a gunman and ends up testifying in a police inquiry to defend his behaviour. The sleuth's unusual methods come under scrutiny in the dock, landing him in even deeper trouble and putting his collaboration with the NYPD in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Officer Down Danny searches for Ricky Russo, the son of former crime boss Happy Jack, who is suspected of killing an off-duty policeman during a diamond robbery. However, Henry suspects the investigation is targeting the wrong man, and decides to see if Happy Jack can shed any more light on the case. Meanwhile, Erin is confounded by her teenage daughter's petulant behaviour. Crime drama, starring Tom Selleck, Donnie Wahlberg and Len Cariou, with Dominic Chianese.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: What You See The FBI alerts Frank to a potential bomb attack in Manhattan, and he puts the police on full alert in a bid to prevent disaster from striking the city. However, the force's attempts to locate the explosives leave several citizens feeling victimised, leading to accusations that officers are unfairly targeting certain sections of society. Drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Poppin' Tags Grissom and Stokes are called in to investigate the fatal shooting of three teenagers, and discover they were murdered while putting up posters to promote hip-hop star Dollar - who is later found bound and gagged in the boot of his car. Evidence initially suggests that competition between rival rappers has taken on a deadly dimension, but inquiries soon take the team in a new direction.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Rashomama The team is called to a wedding reception where the bridegroom's mother has been found dead. The discovery that she was a lawyer working on a controversial case leaves a number of potential suspects, each with a professional grudge - but the car containing all the evidence from the crime scene is later stolen. Starring George Eads and Jorja Fox.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Time of Your Death Grissom, Catherine and Brass investigate the murder of a blackjack player killed following a big win. The man was a Ferrari-driving highroller who had already scooped $10,000 earlier that night in a pool game, but the team discovers he was an entertainment tycoon's assistant, only in Las Vegas for an all-expenses paid weekend funded by his wealthy boss.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Smack Attack Three teenagers die and one falls seriously ill after taking drugs at a party, prompting Danny and Jackie to hunt for the supplier of the lethal narcotics. However, they soon discover the person they want is a murderer rather than a drug dealer. Police drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Brothers Erin puts pressure on a high-school teacher to testify against his brother, one of New York's most feared gang bosses - only for a killer to strike, sparking a fierce debate among the Reagans about her handling of the case. Meanwhile, Jamie discovers a clue that could bring him closer to uncovering Joe's involvement with the Blue Templars. Police drama, starring Tom Selleck and Bridget Moynahan.(n)

Pietro is now undersecretary of the new Interior Minister and must choose between compromising with Berlusconi or being loyal to the party. Drama based in the turbulent political landscape of 1990s Italy. Starring Stefano Accorsi. In Italian.(n)

Dario Scaglia is now working side-by-side with Antonio di Pietro, but has to choose between family and justice while others try to corrupt him. Drama based in the turbulent political landscape of 1990s Italy. Starring Stefano Accorsi. In Italian.(n)

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: The Good Listener Nucky returns to Atlantic City following his dealings with a liquor producer in Cuba, only to be knocked back by a group of possible financiers. He turns to Tonino Sandrelli for help, and also gets in contact with Lansky and Luciano. Back in Chicago, Capone's new enforcer Mike D'Angelo puts the wheels in motion to recoup the money that was lost during a government raid - and Eli and Van Alden are tasked with the job. A series of flashbacks reveal a younger Nucky in 1884 as he comes to terms with his sister's death in the shadow of his father's stand-off with the Commodore.(n)

programme.title: Bah Humduck! A Looney Tunes Christmas
programme.episode-num: Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck and the rest of the gang appear in a special festive episode based on Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol. Daffy Duck, the Scrooge-like proprietor of the Lucky Duck megamart demands his employees work on Christmas Day, leaving Bugs Bunny and the ghosts of Christmas past, present and future to make him see the error of his ways <div class="other">

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shop: Borner Vital Slicer All you need in the kitchen for your precision slicing and dicing of fruits and vegetables. Including three cutting inserts, a finger protector, blade holder and a free docking station.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: 35 Millimetre Murder A photographic lab erroneously sends Dr Sloan someone else's photos, embroiling him in the death of an escort girl. Meanwhile, Amanda prepares to give birth. Medical detective drama, starring Dick Van Dyke.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: The Murder Trade A sinister psychiatrist offers to help Dr Sloan exact revenge on a downsizing expert who threatens the medic's job - in return for a deadly favour. Detective drama, starring Dick Van Dyke.(n)

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: The Cage The vengeance of a jealous father and the terror of a deadly epidemic trap Richard Kimble.(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: The Case of the Petulant Partner A man accuses the wife of his best friend and business partner of being a gold digger, but when she's found dead, Perry must prove he didn't pull the trigger.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The Fall Mac and Stella have reason to suspect a police officer is involved in the murder of a wine store owner after evidence links him to a Hispanic gang present at the crime scene. Their investigations prove upsetting for Flack, as the man under suspicion is his old mentor.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Once a Hero A former marine falls to his death from a hotel balcony, and investigations quickly lead to the discovery of another body. As Gibbs and the team dig deeper, they uncover evidence that points to the activities of a vice ring trafficking young girls. Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Human Traffic A special agent disappears during an undercover assignment, forcing the team to work alongside the LAPD in a case that involves human-trafficking, money-laundering and drugs. Starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Cry Uncle Kimble finds himself in an unusual and dangerous situation when three children decide to use him as an ally in their efforts to run away from an orphanage.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Asylum A man is fatally stabbed outside a coffee shop, and the detectives suspect a local homeless man. However, the conviction is threatened on appeal when it is revealed Cerreta and Logan failed to secure a warrant to search his home - a lean-to in Central Park.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Check The bodies of five people, all of whom are identified as being from the US Navy, are found on the floor of a diner, and all are connected to a suspicious tax firm that specialises in helping people who are in arrears. When further killings are linked to the business, the team realises the crime seem to be copycats of previous cases. Meanwhile, two of Gibbs' ex-wives appear at the location with something important to discuss with the agent. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: Rookie A rookie officer goes undercover as a drug dealer in an attempt to keep heroin out of schools, but his assignment becomes complicated when he meets an old friend.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Black Widow The officers race against time to track down a highly specialised hit squad that has murdered an agent on assignment in Cyprus, desperate to intervene before a second target is killed. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The Enemy Within American social worker Sarah Goode is taken hostage by militants in northern Syria, and thanks to the efforts of the Navy Seals, is eventually returned home unharmed. Evidence from the incident suggests US citizen Kyle Nasry was connected to the kidnapping, but when the agents trace Nasry to a rally held by a controversial imam, they are surprised to find Sarah among the attendees. Meanwhile, DiNozzo finally takes his relationship with Zoe Keates public - surprising none of his colleagues. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Asylum A man is fatally stabbed outside a coffee shop, and the detectives suspect a local homeless man. However, the conviction is threatened on appeal when it is revealed Cerreta and Logan failed to secure a warrant to search his home - a lean-to in Central Park.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Secrets A Navy captain wearing a colourful costume underneath his uniform is shot and killed in a flower shop, and further investigation reveals he was leading a double life as a masked vigilante. Vance brings in Tony's ex-fiancee, journalist Wendy Miller, who claims the victim had been trying to expose a scandal, and as the team pursues the case, a real-estate scam is uncovered. Guest starring Perrey Reeves.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Mind Over Murder Dr Sloan is sceptical of a psychic's claims that she has witnessed a murder, but Jesse staunchly maintains the woman's story is true. Guest starring George Hamilton.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Murder by the Book Three women tempt fate by publishing their kiss-and-tell memoirs and almost pay with their lives. Dick Van Dyke stars in an instalment featuring Jeri Ryan, and US radio DJ Rick Dees as himself.(n)

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Cry Uncle Kimble finds himself in an unusual and dangerous situation when three children decide to use him as an ally in their efforts to run away from an orphanage.(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: The Case of the Dangerous Dowager Perry is asked to retrieve $7,500 in gambling IOUs from a notorious nightclub owner for a woman afraid that it will negatively impact her child custody case.(n)

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: Rookie A rookie officer goes undercover as a drug dealer in an attempt to keep heroin out of schools, but his assignment becomes complicated when he meets an old friend.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The Dove Commission Dan Stanwyck, an investigator working on a report into police corruption, is fatally shot the night before his findings are published. Taylor and Stella are convinced he was killed by a crooked officer whose wrongdoings were about to be exposed. Meanwhile, Danny and Aiden look into the case of a taxi driver stabbed to death in his cab.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Twisted Sister McGee tries to help his sister, who believes she may have murdered someone - but is too traumatised and disorientated to remember exactly what happened. As the team investigates the connected case of a sailor's death, Tony and Abby find themselves distracted by relationship problems. Drama, starring Sean Murray, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Black Widow The officers race against time to track down a highly specialised hit squad that has murdered an agent on assignment in Cyprus, desperate to intervene before a second target is killed. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Detour on a Road Going Nowhere Kimble flees when a burglary at his workplace leads to a check of employee fingerprints, but finds himself stuck on a bus caught in a road washout.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: God Bless the Child A couple appear in court after denying their child life-saving medical treatment for religious reasons. Stone's prosecution hinges on whether the pair are using their beliefs as a cover story, but another case with similar circumstances is uncovered.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The Enemy Within American social worker Sarah Goode is taken hostage by militants in northern Syria, and thanks to the efforts of the Navy Seals, is eventually returned home unharmed. Evidence from the incident suggests US citizen Kyle Nasry was connected to the kidnapping, but when the agents trace Nasry to a rally held by a controversial imam, they are surprised to find Sarah among the attendees. Meanwhile, DiNozzo finally takes his relationship with Zoe Keates public - surprising none of his colleagues. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: The Fighting McLains A Marine Corps officer vows to avenge his sister's murder, and Walker must find him before another life is lost. Adventure, starring Chuck Norris.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Psych Out A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Borderline The team tries to find the culprit behind an ambush on a vehicle transporting marines in the desert, which resulted in the death of one man and abduction of two others. Kensi and Deeks bond as they track the SUV that took the missing soldiers, and Sam risks using a compromised cover identity to meet a former contact in a bid to discover if drug cartels were involved. Meanwhile, Nate returns from his mystery assignment.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: We Build, We Fight Gibbs and his colleagues investigate when Eric Kutzler, the first openly gay Navy lieutenant tipped to receive the Medal of Honour, is murdered. While the agents initially suspect Kutzler's death was the result of a hate crime, the fact that his police officer husband waited 20 minutes to report the crime suggests he had something to hide. Meanwhile, the team throws a baby shower for Palmer as his wife's due date approaches. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.desc: FMurder Dr Sloan suspects a TV hostess of murdering a controversial radio presenter - but she seems to have the perfect alibi. Medical detective drama, starring Dick Van Dyke, Morton Downey Jr and Vicki Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Left-Handed Murder A loan shark, a stockbroker and a group of women pose problems for Dr Sloan as he tries to track down the person responsible for a friend's murder. Dick Van Dyke stars.(n)

programme.desc: Detour on a Road Going Nowhere Kimble flees when a burglary at his workplace leads to a check of employee fingerprints, but finds himself stuck on a bus caught in a road washout.(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: The Case of the Deadly Toy A woman asks for help after she and her boyfriend are constantly harassed by a jealous suitor, but after the stalker is found dead, Perry must prove she didn't do it.(n)

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: The Fighting McLains A Marine Corps officer vows to avenge his sister's murder, and Walker must find him before another life is lost. Adventure, starring Chuck Norris.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Crime and Misdemeanour Mac and Stella investigate a hotel frequented by foreign diplomats after a woman's body is found wrapped in bedsheets. They tangle with a trade representative whose murky past suggests he could be the killer. Meanwhile, Danny argues with his boss over the corpse of a homeless man found covered with silver paint. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes and Carmine Giovinazzo.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Smoked Two FBI agents try to seize control of the team's investigation into the discovery of a perfectly preserved body hidden in a chimney at a marine base. Reluctant to be ousted from the case, Gibbs agrees to work with them - and learns the victim was a serial killer responsible for the deaths of 14 people. Meanwhile, McGee's literary efforts lead to discord with the others.(n)

programme.desc: The Iron Maiden Kimble becomes a sitting duck when he is trapped underground after an explosion in a shaft and Gerard, alerted by a picture in the paper, arrives on the scene.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Misconception A pregnant legal secretary is mugged, and the assault causes her to loses her baby. The subsequent investigation pinpoints her lover as the prime suspect, and he is faced with a charge of foetal murder.(n)

programme.title: NCIS

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: The Iceman Walker's ex-con friend goes undercover to bust open a gang of criminals. Adventure, starring Chuck Norris.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Need to Know Chief petty officer Leland Wiley dies of a heart attack just as he is about to reveal information on elusive arms dealer Agah Bayar. The team discovers the cardiac arrest was caused by someone hacking into a computer monitoring Wiley's pacemaker and increasing his heart rate to 400bpm. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Special Delivery The team investigates the murder of a marine with top-level security clearance, whose body has been discovered in a Beverly Hills car park - minus a hand. As inquiries proceed, the case proves to have unexpected ramifications, including the theft of jewels from Iraqi museums.(n)

programme.desc: Cadence DiNozzo investigates a murder at the military academy he once attended, after a murdered marine and alumni of the school is found clutching a photo of a current student. Medical detective drama, starring Dick Van Dyke.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder

programme.desc: The Iceman Walker's ex-con friend goes undercover to bust open a gang of criminals. Adventure, starring Chuck Norris.(n)

The case becomes more urgent when it emerges that the victim's female room-mate has disappeared. Stella embarks on a harsh line of interrogation that results in her methods being called into question.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Driven The team tries to find out who was responsible for sabotaging a robotic vehicle that caused the death of a Navy lieutenant and almost killed Abby. programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: In Memory Of A renovation project uncovers the remains of a youngster who disappeared 31 years earlier, and causes old memories to resurface for the boy's childhood friend. With the case re-opened, detectives investigate the property's original tenants.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The Tell Confidential files are leaked by an anonymous hacker, who threatens to release more unless the Navy agrees to renew a contract with a struggling shipbuilding firm. The Navy Secretary suspects the company's owner Philip Wickes is to blame, and asks NCIS to join forces with the PsyOps unit in an elaborate ruse to bring the culprit out of hiding. Meanwhile, Gibbs' colleagues begin to notice his attraction to his opposite number Samantha Ryan. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Little Angels A naval commander's 14-year-old daughter is kidnapped and buried alive in side a wooden box, prompting Callen and the team to race to her rescue to unravel clues that lead to a man who has been imprisoned for carrying out three similar crimes. Chris O'Donnell stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Cabin Fever The team suspects Gibbs's arch-nemesis is behind an explosion at a summit on global terror. Meanwhile, a grief-stricken Fornell struggles to deal with the fatal shooting of his ex-wife. American drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Pauley Perrette and Joe Spano.(n)

programme.desc: In Memory Of A renovation project uncovers the remains of a youngster who disappeared 31 years earlier, and causes old memories to resurface for the boy's childhood friend. With the case re-opened, detectives investigate the property's original tenants.(n)

programme.desc: The Tell Confidential files are leaked by an anonymous hacker, who threatens to release more unless the Navy agrees to renew a contract with a struggling shipbuilding firm. The Navy Secretary suspects the company's owner Philip Wickes is to blame, and asks NCIS to join forces with the PsyOps unit in an elaborate ruse to bring the culprit out of hiding. Meanwhile, Gibbs' colleagues begin to notice his attraction to his opposite number Samantha Ryan. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

Drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)
